alert.note: Alert for Hanover; King William; New Kent (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 5:50PM EDT until July 25 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN NEW KENT...SOUTHEASTERN HANOVER AND SOUTHWESTERN KING WILLIAM COUNTIES... At 549 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Manquin, or 9 miles west of King William, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern New Kent, southeastern Hanover and southwestern King William Counties, including the following locations... Enfield, Wrights Corner, Quinton, Central Garage, Rumford, Browns Corner, Orapax Farms, Turpin, New Kent Airport and Westwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
